column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////And great service! With a big group of 15
column2: you'd think somehow they'd screw up our order but I didn't hear one complaint from anyone at our table. However
column3: I'm not a fan of the fact that she couldn't split up our bill (even when four of us at one of the table asked for our food to be put on a separate check at the beginning of the meal - minus one star).
